GAME restriction will be activated. UDP traffic will be authorised on defined rules only.

Fill in the information, then click "Validate":

This back-end has already been setup.
Are you sure you want to delete this back-end?
You can't delete an emergency back-end.
The back-end will be deleted in a few moments.
An error occurred when trying to delete the back-end.
Set the back-end weight, then click on "Validate":
Whole number between 1 and 100. Default value: 8

For example, if back-end A has a weight of 8 and back-end B has a weight of 16, the latter will receive 2 x the amount of traffic as back-end A. Back-ends must be located in the same datacentre (PoP) for weight to impact both of them.
The back-end weights will be modified in a few moments.

Set the protocol to test this back-end, then click on "Validate":
